Ebbro P-4 P416 Nissan Skyline Super Silhouette (KDR30) 1982-1983 Super Silhouette Series M. Hasemi

Purchased: 2014

Ebbro does not indicate which race this could be. In fact the base states Nismo Festival so it would make sense they modeled it on the car as it appeared in one of these festivals. Masihiro Hasemi has some success with this car in the 14 races of the 1982-1983 Super Silhouette series: 6 wins, 2nd place, 3rd place, 9th place, 5 DNFs.

570HP, outrageous bodywork, and a side exit exhaust that continuously spits out massive flames on each downshift. What's not to like? The funky wheels are not the wheels - they're vented plates mounted on the wheels that help extract heat from the brakes.
